description:
Unmasked and without the power of her Spirit Wave, Genkai must rely on her wits to survive in the ring. But is the wise woman’s intellect enough to combat the horror of Shishi Wakamaru’s Chorus of a Thousand Skulls?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genkai. Luptă cu ultimul strop de putere!
Nokosareta Chikara! Maboroshi Umi no Shitou
残された力! 幻海の死闘
